overview: Law is his future, his passion. But what Chloe loves most of all is enjoying life while making a lot of money. While waiting for her father in a bar, she meets Daniel, a wealthy entrepreneur in his forties. So rich that he suggests that she go home with a big wad of cash as a reward. What does she have to do about it? Simply spend a sultry moment in his company ... Of course, she could not keep it to herself, and then decides to talk to her friend Elisa, also eager to make money while rubbing shoulders with lust. ...
title: Chloe, Indecent Innocent
